member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveGenerator.NumberOfPoints
member.summary: Returns the number of control points currently in the CurveGenerator.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveGenerator.Generate
member.summary: Generates the curve defined by the control points in the selected range. There must be at least two control points in the CurveGenerator to define a curve. The resulting curve is truncated to fit the selected range.
member.returns: Array with generated values which defines the curve.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveGenerator.DeletePoint(Windows.Foundation.Point)
member.summary: Delete a control point from the CurveGenerator.
member.param: Control point.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveGenerator.AddPoint(Windows.Foundation.Point)
member.summary: Add a control point to the CurveGenerator. Any previously added control point sharing the same x-value as the new control point will be replaced.
member.param: Control point.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveGenerator.ClearPoints
member.summary: Clears all control points currently set in CurveGenerator

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveGenerator.Points
member.summary: Represents control points. Control points can be set and current control points can be fetched. When setting control points all previously added points to CurveGenerator will be deleted. The control points in the array must be strictly ascending with respect to x.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveGenerator.SetRange(Windows.Foundation.Point,Windows.Foundation.Point)
member.summary: Sets range when rendering look-up table
member.param: Minimum x and y value.
Maximum x and y value.

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveGenerator.CurveType
member.summary: Sets the curve type defined in CurveType

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveGenerator.#ctor(System.Int32,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveType,Windows.Foundation.Point,Windows.Foundation.Point,Windows.Foundation.Point,Windows.Foundation.Point)
member.summary: Creates a CurveGenerator with two initial points. The initial points can be changed by public methods. Calling CurveGenerator::Generate directly after object creation would generate curve specified with input parameters in constructor. Curve Handler requires minimum of two points for curve generation.
member.param: The maximum number of control points to be used when defining the curves.
One of the curve types defined in CurveType
The minimum values of x and y
The maximum values of x and y
Initial first point on the curve.
Initial second point on the curve.

member.name: T:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveGenerator
member.summary: This class handles look-up table generation for Curves filter.

member.name: T:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveType
member.summary: Curve types that are used to with the CurveGenerator to generate curve filter look-up tables for the curve filter.

member.name: F:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveType.NaturalCubicSpline
member.summary: Use natural cubic spline interpolation between the points.

member.name: F:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.CurveType.Linear
member.summary: Use linear interpolation between the points.

member.name: T:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterGroup

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.EditingSession.RenderToJpegAsync(Windows.Foundation.Size,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.OutputOption,System.Double,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.OutputColorSpacing)
member.summary: Asynchronous render of editingSession to jpeg. Rendered jpeg will have specified dimensions and discrepancies in aspect ratio will be handled according to specified output options.
member.param: Desired size of the rendered jpeg.
Desired behavior when source and target aspect ratio differ.
Desired jpeg quality between 0.0 and 1.0.

Color spacing will affect how the color channels are sub-sampled when encoding the JPEG file. Sub-sampling of the color channels will reduce the resulting file size. YUV 4:2:0 color spacing is recommended for achieving the lowest file size.
member.returns: Asynchronously returns an IBuffer containing the jpeg data.

member.param: Desired size of the rendered jpeg.
Desired behavior when source and target aspect ratio differ.
member.returns: Asynchronously returns an IBuffer containing the jpeg data.

member.summary: Asynchronous render of editingSession to jpeg.
member.returns: Asynchronously returns an IBuffer containing the jpeg data.

member.summary: EditingSession destructor.

member.summary: Creates a editingSession from a bitmap.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.EditingSession.#ctor(Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.InputImageFormat)
member.summary: Creates a sesssion from a buffer.
member.param: Buffer containing the image data.
Image type in the buffer.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.EditingSession.#ctor(Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer)
member.summary: Creates a sesssion from a compressed image buffer.
member.remarks: An attempt will be made to automatically detect the image format. If the image date is not corrupt the editingSession should be able to detect JPEG, GIF, PNG, TIFF, BMP, WBMP. If the image format cannot be determined an exeception will be thrown. For optimal performance, or if the image format cannot be determined, please provide the image format explicitly when creating a new editingSession.
member.param: Buffer containing the compressed image data.

member.name: T:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.EditingSession
member.summary: This class represents image processing editingSession.

member.summary: Blends a editingSession on the current editingSession image using blend function.
member.param: The editingSession image to blend into the current image.
Blend function to use when blending the two images.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateWarpFilter(Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.WarpEffect,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the warp effect to apply. Warp applied on entire image
member.param: The warp effect to apply. Can be any of the values from the WarpEffect enumeration
strength Amount of effect applied. 0.0f means no effect. 1.0f means full effect.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateWarpFilter(Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.WarpEffect,System.Single,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.Rotation,Windows.Foundation.Rect[])
member.summary: Sets the warp effect to apply
member.param: The warp effect to apply. Can be any of the values from the WarpEffect enumeration
strength Amount of effect applied. 0.0f means no effect. 1.0f means full effect.
Rotation of the effect.
Array of rectangles where warp is applied. Rectangles that are outside of the current image size will be cropped to the valid area. There must be at least one rectangle in the array.

member.summary: Applies noise to the current editingSession image.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateMirrorFilter
member.summary: Applies a mirror effect on the current editingSession image.

member.summary: Applies a posterize effect. Reduces the number of colors.

member.summary: Applies a solarize effect.
member.param: The threshold level of the solarize effect. Range: [0.0, 1.0]

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateEmbossFilter(System.Single)

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateMilkyFilter
member.summary: Applies a "milky" surface effect to the image.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateBlurFilter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Blur filter. Applies blur effect to the image.
member.param: The blur effect level. This corresponds closely to the kernel size of the BlurLevel enum. Zero of negative values will return an error code.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateBlurFilter(Windows.Foundation.Rect,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.BlurRegionShape,System.Int32)
member.summary: Blur filter. Applies blur effect to the image.
member.param: A Rect specifying the effective region to blur within the image, given in current coordinates. The blur is applied to the entire image if the width and/or height value is zero (independent of the position). The coordinates given will correspond to the upper-left corner of the blur region.
Set the region shape of the blur effect. Can be any of the values from BlurRegionShape enumeration.
The blur effect level. This corresponds closely to the kernel size of the BlurLevel enum. Zero of negative values will return an error code.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateBlurFilter(Windows.Foundation.Rect,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.BlurRegionShape,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.BlurLevel)
member.summary: Blur filter. Applies blur effect to the image.
member.param: A Rect specifying the effective region to blur within the image, given in current coordinates. The blur is applied to the entire image if the width and/or height value is zero (independent of the position). The coordinates given will correspond to the upper-left corner of the blur region.
Set the region shape of the blur effect. Can be any of the values from BlurRegionShape enumeration.
The blur effect level. Can be any of the values from the BlurLevel enumeration.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateBlurFilter(Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.BlurLevel)
member.summary: Blur filter. Applies blur effect to the image.
member.param: The blur effect level. Can be any of the values from the BlurLevel enumeration.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateCurvesFilter(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates filter with specified lookup tables. Each table must be 256 bytes in size. If some of the tables should not be updated then size of that table should be NULL. Lookup tables can be generated by using CurveGenerator.
member.param: Color lookup tables for R channel.
Color lookup tables for G channel.
Color lookup tables for B channel.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateColorSwapFilter(Windows.UI.Color,Windows.UI.Color,System.UInt32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adjusts the parameters of the Color-swap filter.
member.param: Parameter that specifies which color that should be converted.
Parameter that specifies which color srcColor should be converted to.

Specifies the tolerance level of the effect. If the colorDistance is small, only a small variation around the color defined with srcColor will be converted to swapColor. Must be in the range 0 < colorDistance <=255.
Specifies if the other colors should be converted to grayscale or be preserved.

Parameter to control if the luminance should be included in the color swap. If swapLuminance is set to false only the color components will be swapped, not the luminance. If swapLuminance is set to true the source color and the range specified with colorDistance will be transformed exact the color specified with swapColor. Recommended value for best photorealistic results is to set swapLuminance to false.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateSplitToneFilter(Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.SplitToneRange[])
member.summary: Sets one, or more, luminance ranges with specific colors for the SplitToning filter. The SplitToning effect applies a given color to pixels with luminance values within an interval specified by a SplitToneRange struct. Several different intervals may be specified, each with a different color associated to it. Typical usage is to define a shadow luminance range, and a highlight luminance range, with different colors applied to each range.
member.param: Array of SplitToneRanges

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateLomoFilter(System.Double,System.Double,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.LomoVignetting,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.LomoStyle)
member.summary: Applies lomo effect on the current editingSession image.
member.param: The brightness of the image. Range [0.0, 1.0], where 0.0 gives a bright image and 1.0 a dark image.
The color saturation of the image. Range [0.0, 1.0], where 0.0 implies no saturation.
The vignetting level.
Color style

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateColorizationFilter(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: Colorization filter. Adjusts color tone and luminance/chrominance levels. Adds a single color to an image.
member.param: Red component of reference color. Range: [0, 255]
Green component of reference color. Range: [0, 255]
Blue component of reference color. Range: [0, 255]
Strength of luminance. Range: [-100, 200]
Strength of chrominance. Range: [-100, 200]

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateColorAdjustFilter(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Color adjust filter. Adjusts the RGB color composition of the current editingSession image.
member.param: Red channel adjustment. Range [-1.0, 1.0].
Green channel adjustment. Range [-1.0, 1.0].
Blue channel adjustment. Range [-1.0, 1.0].

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateImageFusionFilter(Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer,Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Inserts an image on the current image with a separately defined alpha mask.
member.param: Buffer containing the image to be merged with the current image The following input formats are supported for the image: Jpeg, Png, Gif, Bmp, Wbmp and Tiff
Buffer containing the alpha mask. The following input formats are supported for the image: Jpeg, Png, Gif, Bmp, Wbmp and Tiff
If this is false, 0 - 255 is fading from the editingSession image to the frame provided If this is true, 0 - 255 is fading from the provided frame to editingSession image

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateImageFusionFilter(Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.Bitmap,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.Bitmap,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Inserts an image on the current image with a separately defined alpha mask.
member.param: An image to be merged with the current image. The following color modes are supported for the image: Argb8888, Bgra8888, Rgb565, Ayuv4444

A raw image containing the alpha mask. The mask is assumed to be a gray scale image. If the image is of a richer color format it will first automatically be converted into gray scale and any alpha channel will be ignored.The following color modes are supported for the image: Argb8888, Bgra8888, Rgb565, Ayuv4444 and Gray8
If this is false, 0 - 255 is fading from the editingSession image to the frame provided If this is true, 0 - 255 is fading from the provided frame to editingSession image

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateFrameFilter(Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.Bitmap)
member.summary: Image frame filter. Overlays the existing image with a transparent frame/image.
member.param: The frame image. The image is streched or contracted to fit the size of the editingSession image.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateWatercolorFilter(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Image water color filter. Applies water color filter to image.
member.param: Specifies light intensity. Range [0.0, 1.0].
Specifies color intensity. Range [0.0, 1.0].

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateVignettingFilter(System.Double,Windows.UI.Color)
member.summary: Image vignetting filter. Applies vignetting effect to the image. Vignetting applied on entire image
member.param: The size of the transition region given in fraction of the radius. Allowed range: [0.0, 15.0] Recommended range: [0.0, 1.0]
The color to use for the vignetting effect.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateVignettingFilter(Windows.Foundation.Rect,System.Double,Windows.UI.Color)
member.summary: Image vignetting filter. Applies vignetting effect to the image.

param.name: region
param.para: A Rect defining where the vignetting should be applied. The transition area will start outside the ellipse that can be inscribed inside this region. The Rect::X and Rect::Y members specifies the offset in pixels of the region's top left corner, seen from the top left corner of the image. The Rect::Width and Rect::Height members specifies the size of the region in pixels. Coordinates should be given using current coordinates.

member.param: The size of the transition region given in fraction of the radius. Range: [0.0, 15.0]
The color to use for the vignetting effect.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateMagicPenFilter
member.summary: Magic pen filter. Applies a mix of edge distinction and color manipulation of the image.

member.summary: Image cartoon filter. Transforms image to typical cartoon graphic style.
member.param: If set to true all detected edges in the image are rendered distinctively, if false edges are ignored.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateMonoColorFilter(Windows.UI.Color,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Image mono color filter. Preserves one color tone while other colors are converted to grayscale.
member.param: Specifies color that will be preserved

member.summary: Image brightness filter.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateWhiteboardEnhancementFilter(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Effect should enhance text and drawings on an image of a whiteboard.
member.param: If true, the effect will better preserve the colors on the whiteboard. If false, the image contrast will be enhanced and text should be easier to read.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateTemperatureAndTintFilter(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Temperature and tint filter. Changes color temperature and tint.
member.param: Color temperature index. Range [-100, 100], where 0 is default, unmodified color temperature.
Color tint index. Range [-100, 100], where 0 is the default, unmodified color tint.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateAutoEnhanceFilter(Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoEnhanceConfiguration)
member.summary: Auto enhance filter. Specifies the desired behaviour of the image enhancement. The following effects can be applied: White balance, Contrast and Local boost
member.param: Auto enhance configuration object. See for detailed description.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateExposureFilter(Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.ExposureMode,System.Double)
member.summary: Adjust the brightness of an image using one of the modes in ExposureMode. Use gamma as default mode.
member.param: The exposure mode to be used.

The desired exposure level. Positive values will make the image brighter, negative values will make it darker. The exposure level. Range is [ -1.0, 1.5 ], but for gamma mode the effect saturates at 1.0, which means that everything between ]1.0, 1.5] will be intrepreted as 1.0. 0.0 equals no change of exposure. Recommended range for both gamma and natural mode for normal usage is [ -1.0, 1.0 ].

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateAutoLevelsFilter
member.summary: Auto level adjustment balances the intensity level of the image, for example making dark images lighter and vice versa.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateLevelsFilter(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Applies level adjustment to the current editingSession image.
member.param: The position of the bright saturating point. Range [0.0, 1.0].
The relative position of the middle gray point. Range [0.0, 1.0], where 0.0 is at the bright saturating point and 1.0 is at the dark saturating point.
The position of the dark saturating point. Range [0.0, 1.0]. The value of 'black' should be smaller than, or equal to the value of 'white'.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateWhiteBalanceFilter(Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.WhiteBalanceMode,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Performs white balance adjustment on an image.
member.param: The white balance mode, can be any of the values from the WhiteBalanceMode enumeration. Cluster is prefered as default.
Red component of the white color used for reference This requires that the mode is set to Manual, neglected otherwise.
Green component of the white color used for reference This requires that the mode is set to Manual, neglected otherwise.
Blue component of the white color used for reference This requires that the mode is set to Manual, neglected otherwise.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateColorBoostFilter(System.Double)
member.summary: Amplifies the colors of the current editingSession image.
member.param: The color boost gain level. Range [-1.0, 20.0]. Negative values reduce the colors. Recommended values are in the range [-1.0, 1.0].

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateLocalBoostFilter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Automatically boost and enhance images with unequal illumination.
member.remarks: The image is analyzed and segmented into a dark part and a light part. The two parts are processed separatly and are finally blended together to produce a modified image. autoLevel parameter maps the manual parameters in a range [0-14].
member.param: Range: [0 <= autoLevel <= 14] Recommended default value: 8

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateLocalBoostFilter(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Manually boost and enhance images with unequal illumination.
member.remarks: The image is analyzed and segmented into a dark part and a light part. The two parts are processed separatly and are finally blended together to produce a modified image.
member.param: Gamma correction for the dark part of the image. Range: [0.1 <= gamma < 5.0] Recommended value: 1.9
Contrast amplification of the dark part. Range: [0.5 <= darkContrast < 1.0] Recommended value: 0.625
Contrast amplification of the light part. Range: [0.5 <= lightContrast < 1.0] Recommended value: 0.5

Specifies how much of the processed image that will be blended in the original image. If sensitivityLevel equals 0, the result will be 100% of the orignal image and 0% of the processed image. If sensitivityLevel equals 256, the result will be 0% of the original image and 100% of the processed image. Range: [0.0 <= sensitivityLevel <= 256.0] Recommended value: 256.0

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateFoundationFilter
member.summary: Applies a foundation effect on the entire current editingSession image.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory.CreateFoundationFilter(Windows.Foundation.Rect)
member.summary: Applies a foundation effect on the region in current editingSession image.
member.param: The region in which the effect is applied, for instance a face, given in current coordinates.

member.name: T:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.FilterFactory
member.summary: Contains artistic filters and filters that enhance image by modifying brightness, colors, color temperature, image exposure and other attributes.
member.remarks: All coordinates refers to current coordinates, i.e coordinates after transformations like crop, scaling and rotations.

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.SplitToneRange.Blue
member.summary: Defines the Blue component of the RGB color to be set for the luminance

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.SplitToneRange.Green
member.summary: Defines the Green component of the RGB color to be set for the luminance

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.SplitToneRange.Red
member.summary: Defines the Red component of the RGB color to be set for the luminance

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.SplitToneRange.LuminanceHigh
member.summary: Defines the higher luminance value.
member.remarks: Allowed range is [ 0, 255 ]. Must be higher than luminanceLowValue.

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.SplitToneRange.LuminanceLow
member.summary: Defines the lower luminance value.
member.remarks: Allowed range is [ 0, 255 ]. Must be lower than luminanceHighValue.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.SplitToneRange.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new SplitToneRange object
member.param: Defines the lower luminance value. Allowed range is [ 0, 255 ]. Must be lower than luminanceHighValue.
Defines the higher luminance value. Allowed range is [ 0, 255 ]. Must be higher than luminanceLowValue.
Defines the R value of the RGB color to be set for the luminance Allowed range is [ luminanceLowValue, luminanceHighValue ].
Defines the G value of the RGB color to be set for the luminance Allowed range is [ luminanceLowValue, luminanceHighValue ].
Defines the B value of the RGB color to be set for the luminance Allowed range is [ luminanceLowValue, luminanceHighValue ].

member.name: T:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.SplitToneRange
member.summary: Defines a luminance range and the color to be applied by the split tone filter.

member.summary: Uses the estimated maximum intensity color.

member.summary: Resize the rotated image so that the original image dimensions fit inside the rotated image.

member.summary: Resize the rotated image so that it fits inside the original image dimensions.

member.name: F:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.RotationResizeMode.Ignore
member.summary: Do not resize while rotating

member.summary: Adjust the brightness of an image using a gamma correction curve.

member.name: F:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.ExposureMode.Natural
member.summary: Adjust the brightness of an image using a "natural" curve inspired by a film characteristic curve. This mode preserves the blacks in an image much better than the gamma mode.

member.name: T:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.IEditingSession
member.summary: A session for editing an image using filters.
member.remark: This interface is provided in order to facilitate the creation of test doubles. It is not possible for a user of the SDK to create an implementation of IEditingSession that will work with the filters provided in the SDK.

member.remarks: Do not call this method directly, use IEditingSession::Undo

members.member: Creates an Exif instance based on the exif data contained in the provided buffer. buffer: the provided buffer to use when creating the Exif instance; must not be null returns the created Exif instance or an empty instance if valid exif data was not found.

member.summary: Jpeg squeeze of an image into a new smaller jpeg using configured auto resize parameters.

Resize configuration parameters.
member.returns: Asynchronously returns buffer with squeezed jpeg

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.JpegTools.SqueezeAsync(Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Jpeg squeeze of an image into a new smaller jpeg with a desired maximum buffer size in bytes.
member.param: Source jpeg buffer to be squeezed.
Desired maximum output jpeg size.
member.returns: Asynchronously returns buffer with squeezed jpeg

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.JpegTools.BlendAsync(Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.Bitmap,Windows.Foundation.Point)
member.summary: Blends a jpeg image with another bitmap image into a new jpeg. The source jpeg image dimensions cannot be smaller than the dimensions of the bitmap image to blend.
member.param: Source jpeg to be blended.
Bitmap image to be blended with jpeg image. Image must be in ARGB8888 or AYUV4444 color mode.
Blend start position in the jpeg image (upper left corner).
member.returns: Asynchroniously returns buffer with blended jpeg

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.JpegTools.FlipAsync(Windows.Storage.Streams.IBuffer,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Performs lossless flip, flips a jpeg into a new jpeg.
member.param: Source jpeg to be flipped.
Specifies if jpeg should be horisontally flipped.
Specifies if jpeg should be vertically flipped.
member.returns: Asynchroniously returns buffer with flipped jpeg

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeConfiguration.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeConfiguration.ColorSpacing
member.summary: One of the supported color spaces.

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeConfiguration.MinEncodingQuality
member.summary: The lowest desired encoding quality. Must be in the range [0.0, 1.0]

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeConfiguration.ResizeMode
member.summary: One of the AutoResizeModes

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeConfiguration.MinImageSize
member.summary: Minimum image size to achieve.

remarks.para: The rendered image will be at least as large as this size in at least one dimension. The size must be smaller than maxImageSize. A minImageSize of {160, 120} will, for the following different source image sizes, give this minimum size:

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeConfiguration.MaxImageSize
member.summary: Maximum image size to achieve.

remarks.para: The rendered image will fit within this outer bounding box when allowing for rotation. The size must be larger than minImageSize. A maxImageSize of {640, 480} will, for the following different source image sizes, give this maximum size:

member.name: P:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeConfiguration.MaxBufferSize
member.summary: Maximum output buffer size in bytes.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeConfiguration.#ctor(System.UInt32,Windows.Foundation.Size,Windows.Foundation.Size,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeMode,System.Double,Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.ColorSpace)
member.summary: Creates a new resize configuration object for the JpegTools.
member.param: Maximum output buffer size in bytes.

param.name: maxImageSize
param.para: Maximum image size to achieve. The rendered image will fit within this outer bounding box when allowing for rotation. The size must be larger than minImageSize. A maxImageSize of {640, 480} will, for the following different source image sizes, give this maximum size:

param.name: minImageSize
param.para: Minimum image size to achieve. The rendered image will be at least as large as this size in at least one dimension. The size must be smaller than maxImageSize. A minImageSize of {160, 120} will, for the following different source image sizes, give this minimum size:

member.param: One of the AutoResizeModes
The lowest desired encoding quality. Must be in the range [0.0, 1.0]

Color spacing will affect how the color channels are sub-sampled when encoding the JPEG file. Sub-sampling of the color channels will reduce the resulting file size. YUV 4:2:0 color spacing is recommended for achieving the lowest file size.

member.name: T:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration settings for the JpegTools resize.

member.name: T:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeMode
member.summary: Resize modes used with JpegTools::AutoResizeAsync.

member.name: F:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeMode.PrioritizeHighEncodingQuality
member.summary: Auto resize will try to preserve the highest possible encoding quality while shrinking the width and height of the image. This might be useful if you substantially reduce the size of the image.

member.name: F:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeMode.PrioritizeLargeImageSize
member.summary: Auto resize will try to preserve the maxImageSize while lowering the encoding quality.

member.name: F:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeMode.PreserveSourceEncodingQuality
member.summary: Auto resize will try to preserve the source encoding quality while shrinking the width and height of the image.

member.name: F:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoResizeMode.Automatic
member.summary: Auto resize will simultaneously lower the encoding quality and shrink the width and height of the image.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoEnhanceConfiguration.ApplyLocalBoost(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Apply local boost using the specified gamma, darkContrast, lightContrast and sensitivityLevel values.
member.param: The gamma correction applied to the dark areas in the image. Values greater than 1.0 gives a logarithmic response and will make these parts brighter. Values less than 1.0 gives an exponential response and will make these parts darker. gamma should be in the range [0.01, 10.0].
Contrast applied to the dark areas in the image. Values greater than 0.5 will increase the contrast. Values less than 0.5 will decrease the contrast. darkContrast should be in the range [0.0, 0.99].

Contrast applied to the bright areas in the image. Values greater than 0.5 will increase the contrast. Values less than 0.5 will decrease the contrast. lightContrast should be in the range [0.0, 0.99].
The amount of boost to apply. sensitivityLevel should be in the range [0.0 1.0] where 0.0 is no effect and 1.0 is full local boost.
member.returns: A handle to the current object.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoEnhanceConfiguration.ApplyAutomaticLocalBoost
member.summary: Apply local boost, try to estimate the needed amount of boost and automatically set gamma, darkContrast, lightContrast and sensitivityLevel.
member.returns: A handle to the current object.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoEnhanceConfiguration.ApplyContrastAndBrightnessOff
member.summary: Do not apply contrast and brightness.
member.returns: A handle to the current object.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoEnhanceConfiguration.ApplyContrastAndBrightness(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Apply contrast and brightness.
member.param: Values greater than 0 will increase the contrast, values less than 0 will decrease the contrast. Must be in the range [-1.0, 1.0].
Values greater than 0 will make the image brighter, values less than 0 will make the image darker. Must be in the range [-1.0, 1.0].
member.returns: A handle to the current object.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoEnhanceConfiguration.ApplyAutomaticContrastAndBrightness
member.summary: Apply an automatic contrast and brightness enhancement.
member.returns: A handle to the current object.

member.name: M:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoEnhanceConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new configuration object for the AutoEnhance filter.
member.remarks: The created object will apply automatic contrast, brightness and local boost, and will not apply white balance.

member.name: T:Nokia.Graphics.Imaging.AutoEnhanceConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration settings for the AutoEnhance filter.
